## Why OpenAPI?

- REST APIs are the most common interface on the internet today
- Huge variation in design
- A standardised format for documentation is crucial
- Open standards
  - Support tooling
  - Machine readable
  - Common language
  - Technology/Programming language agnostic

## Architect-driven or dev-driven?

```{mermaid}
---
title: Architect-driven
config:
  theme: dark
---
%%| fig-width: 6.5
flowchart LR
  A[OpenAPI Spec] -->|Generate|B(Server code)
```

::: {.notes}
**Pros:** Technology agnostic, can involve non-devs

**Cons:** Horrible dev experience, harder to customize the code
:::

```{mermaid}
---
title: Dev-driven
config:
  theme: dark
---
flowchart LR
  B(Server code)-->|Generate|A[OpenAPI Spec]
```

::: {.notes}
**Pros:** Less context switching, retain typing

**Cons:** Need to be in the code base
:::
